title: Healing Crystal Mini Dress

cleaned_text: Description The Healing Crystal mini dress has a draped cowl neckline, that opens low cut across the chest, that is connected by sacred Raw Moonstone crystal. These celestial iridescent crystals are symbolic of new beginnings - harnessing the energy of the moon, for inner strength and grown - they provide calmness and relaxed energy, that promotes positive wellbeing and enhanced intuition and connection to your body and soul. The mini dress has a diamond cut out opening on the back.
